title: FS: SGC graded T205 - ALL SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: SGC graded T205 - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Have these available for sale. Also have several commons graded SGC 10-55, just shoot me a PM for the list.

Would be willing to negotiate, especially if buying more than 1. I accept paypal and money orders with shipment on receipt of payment.

REMOVED SOLD CARDS

$SOLD Bresnahan Closed Mouth SGC 40
$SOLD Chase Frame Ends SGC 45
$SOLD Hoblitzell “Cin after 1908” SGC 55
$SOLD Phelan SGC 30
